description: This file defines a struct 'AccessControl' within the namespace 'WPEFramework::Core', providing static methods for managing file ownership and permissions on POSIX systems, including functions to change ownership, set permissions, and apply both based on node attributes.

classes.name: AccessControl
classes.description: Provides static methods for managing file ownership and permissions, including ownership change, permission setting, and combined application based on node attributes.

methods.name: uint32_t OwnerShip(const string & node,const string & userName,const string & groupName)
methods.description: Changes the ownership of a file specified by node to the specified user and group by name.

methods.name: uint32_t Permission(const string & node,const uint16_t modeFlags)
methods.description: Sets the permission mode of a file specified by node.

methods.name: uint32_t Apply(const Core::NodeId & node)
methods.description: Applies ownership and permission settings to a NodeId object based on its attributes.

ctags.name: OwnerShip
ctags.pattern: /^        static uint32_t OwnerShip(const string& node, const string& userName, const string& grou/
ctags.signature: (const string & node,const string & userName,const string & groupName)

ctags.name: Permission
ctags.pattern: /^        static uint32_t Permission(const string& node, const uint16_t modeFlags){$/
